pli-tv-bi-vb-pc4:6.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc4:6.2: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarā purāṇarājorodhā bhikkhunīsu pabbajitā hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc4:6.3: Aññatarā bhikkhunī anabhiratiyā pīḷitā yena sā bhikkhunī tenupasaṅkami;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc4:6.9: Atha kho sā bhikkhunī tassā bhikkhuniyā jatumaṭṭhakaṃ ācikkhi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc4:6.10: Atha kho sā bhikkhunī jatumaṭṭhakaṃ ādiyitvā dhovituṃ vissaritvā ekamantaṃ chaḍḍesi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc4:7.7: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhunī jatumaṭṭhakaṃ ādiyissati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc4:7.8: Netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc4:7.9: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc4:10.2: samphassaṃ sādiyantī antamaso uppalapattampi muttakaraṇaṃ paveseti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
